mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM USER_RESUME UR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX , LISTAGG(DISTINCT SKILL_IDX, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_IDX) AS SKILL_IDX FROM COMMON_COMPANY_RECRUIT_SKILL
WHERE SKILL_IDX IN
#{ skill.skill_idx }
GROUP BY COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX ) CCRK ON CCRK.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX JOIN REGION R ON CR.REGION_IDX = R.REGION_IDX
WHERE CR.REGION_IDX IN
#{ region.region_idx }
ORDER BY CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_REGDATE DESC OFFSET #{ startRow } ROWS FETCH NEXT #{ endRow } ROWS ONLY
